extra.descriptionForm: Choose the statements that match your situation knowing that the feed is in accordance with targeted performance:
extra.resultEmpty: According to FAO, 25% of raw materials worldwide are contaminated.

evaluationResult.text-result: Probability to have a significant level of mycotoxins in diet
evaluationResult.footerPdf: Contact our specialists in mycotoxins for customized interpretation and technical support, tailored to your situation.
evaluationResult.bodyText: This report was sent from Olmix Myco'Evaluator App
evaluationResult.CompartirInforme: Enter email addresses, separated by commas

fields.low-milk-production: Lower milk production than the diet potential
fields.somatic-cells: Significant increase of somatic cells or mastitis
fields.leg-troubles: Increase of lameness and leg troubles (swollen hooves, joints, dermatitis...)
fields.metabolic-troubles: Increase of metabolic and pathologic troubles (abomasum displacement, SARA, fatty liver,metritis, jejunal hemorrhage…)
fields.weak-calves: Weak calves (diarrhea, stunted growth, oral and dermal lesions...)
fields.reproduction-performance: Low reproductive performance (heat detection, success at 1st AI…)
fields.troubles-from-raw-materials: The above troubles started with the use of new forages or raw materials

fields.corn-procedence: Corn is produced on single-crop farming field
fields.fusarium: Fusarium molds/diseases were observed on field
fields.grass-silage-cropped: Grass silage was cropped after corn

fields.molds: Molds are present (red, blue, white or black...)
fields.silage-troubles: Poor compaction (high DM, speed of harvesting)
fields.warm-silage: Silage is warm or took a long time to cool down
fields.grass-silage: Grass silage is not as clean as usual
fields.silage-front-consuption: Silage front is consumed too slowly

fields.sows-status: Unsatisfying general status of the sows
fields.poor-growth: Poor growth of piglets or fattening pigs
fields.stillborn-piglets: Increase in mummified or stillborn piglets (low prolificity)
fields.small-piglets-at-birth: Uneven size or small piglets at birth
fields.necrosis: Ear and tail necrosis and/or nervosity
fields.reproduction-troubles: Increase in reproduction troubles (metritis, placenta retention…)
fields.heat-detection: Problems in heat detection or high returns rate

fields.use-of-corn: Significant use of corn or corn by-products
fields.storage-facilities: Poor storage facilities and management (ventilation, cleaning)
fields.grains-preservation-problems: Problems during grain or feed transport or preservation (heat, pests, moisture)

fields.gizzard: Inflammation in crop, proventriculus, gizzard, intestine
fields.thymus: Abnormal development of thymus and bursa of Fabricius

fields.gizzard: Inflammation in crop, proventriculus, gizzard, intestine
fields.thymus: Abnormal development of thymus and bursa of Fabricius

fields.use-of-corn: Significant use of corn or corn by-product
fields.storage-facilities: Poor storage facilities and management (ventilation, cleaning)
fields.feed-management: All above described troubles followed a change in feed management
fields.preservation-problems: Problems during grain or feed transport or preservation (heat, pests, moisture)

fields.shell-quality: Low egg shell quality (increased cracked, shell-less, pale eggs)
